description: AI-assisted implementation of the Monytix MVP (SpendSense, Goals, BudgetPilot, GoalCompass, MoneyMoments, Realtime Ingestion).

agents.name: backend-architect
agents.role: Design FastAPI services and data models according to FRS and augment_rules.md.

agents.name: frontend-pwa-dev
agents.role: Implement React PWA screens and API calls matching backend contracts.
constraints: Use SSE endpoint for realtime updates.
Never store secrets in frontend code.

agents.name: etl-pipeline-engineer
agents.role: Own CSV/email ingestion, normalization, categorization, and KPI jobs.
constraints: Pipelines must be idempotent and replay-safe.
Parser errors must not break the pipeline.

agents.name: qa-tester
agents.role: Create and maintain tests matching Module 10 acceptance criteria.

global_constraints: Prefer small, reviewable PRs grouped by epic/task.
All money values must be treated as NUMERIC(14,2) and not floats in business logic.
